reviewText: This tape has a lot of clips and interviews of Lucy from not only her famous I LOVE LUCY tv show, but from guest appearances on other shows and a lot of stuff never seen on video before. I really enjoyed viewing it. The only thing spoiling it was the fact that for some reason Film Shows, Inc. decieded not to use a host but instead used printing on the screen instead. This was distracting and sometimes flashed on and off the screen too fast to read the whole thing. This is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5.
